sector_start_landmark: Zebra crossinf before rail bridge, clockwise towards Clyde Kicker
sector_description: Ride from the rail bridge near the entry point to Glasgow, under the Central Station building, up the Clyde Kicker, through the rollers, past the church and finish at the zebra crossing just before left bend to Champ./pens
